comment:
Very weak.  On the nose Vanilla and citrus have to be dug for.  Palate very weak flavors.  No finish.  

Smooth with almost no burn.  Would be recommended in a mixed drink where bourbon is not the primary.
Hands down, the worst whiskey I've ever had. I'm really ashamed to call this whiskey. I wont even let my wife cook with it. Do not buy this!
Weird plastic-like taste on the front, sweet cola on the back end. Very short, disappearing finish
Really funky taste with this one.  It’s smooth, but the plasticy-bitter taste is really off putting. Don’t know what happened here. Tastes very, very young.  Not a fan.  2/10
Love the caramel and sweet notes. Very good bourbon
dark but young tasting, spicy, all up front, short.
